name: Necklace
description: The necklace consists of a shimmering blue-green crystal at the end of a long platinum chain.

name: Short Sword
description: This nice sharp piece of steel is a couple of feet long.

name: Axe
description: This is a very small axe, but also very sharp.

name: Black obsidian staff
description: This is a long, dominating staff which doesn't nearly feel as heavy as it should.

name: Moonstone ring
description: A simple, classic platinum band wraps around the wearer's finger, and two small rose-cut diamonds flank the central moonstone in its open setting.

name: Green malachite pendant
description: Swirls of light and dark green malachite combine in this pendant, reflecting the light and casting a green aura around the wearer's throat.

name: Silver long sword
description: This lovely, gleaming long sword is made of about four feet of solid silver.

name: Repeating crossbow
description: Made from lacquered oak, this crossbow has a complicated steel mechanism which allows it to be loaded with several bolts at once.
